Posts.Content: Vicki5 wrote: I start Taxtere & Carboplatin tomorrow.  I had stage 1 breast cancer not in the lymphnodes but w/ lymphvascular invasion present.  Had a singe mastectomy 4 weeks ago. I have to have 6 session, 1 every 3 weeks for about 2 hours via IV. Any experience you can share will be REALLY appreciated. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Taxotere & Carboplatin Vicki5 chumfry
